snippet: LEAD: State officials said today that the earthquake had caused more damage to the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge than had been thought and that the span could be closed as long as two months....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: State officials said today that the earthquake had caused more damage to the San Francisco-Oakland Bay Bridge than had been thought and that the span could be closed as long as two months.

headline.main: Damage to Link Across Bay Is More Serious Than Thought
headline.kicker: THE CALIFORNIA QUAKE: THE BAY BRIDGE

byline.original: Special to The New York Times
